means: 使（过程、工厂等）机械化( mechanize的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The production process is now highly mechanized.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在的生产过程高度机械化。

sentence.Network_en: A good deal of housework can be mechanized.
sentence.Network_cn: 大量家务活可用机械化操作.

sentence.Network_en: Intensive mechanized agriculture is typically regarded as being efficient.
sentence.Network_cn: 机械化集约农业是高效率的典型.

entry.def: If someone mechanizes a process, they cause it to be done by a machine or machines, when it was previously done by people.

example.ex: Only gradually are technologies being developed to mechanize the task...
example.tran: 使这项任务实现机械化的技术只能逐步发展。

example.ex: Perhaps, in time, this treatment will be mechanised.
example.tran: 也许这种治疗方法最终将实现机械化。
